amendment.description: An amendment numbered 19 printed in the Congressional Record to prohibit any funds to be used to implement or enforce Executive Order 13083 (titled "Federalism" and dated May 14, 1998).

vote.text: On agreeing to the Kolbe amendment (A030) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: On agreeing to the Kolbe amendment (A030) Agreed to by recorded vote: 417 - 2 (Roll No. 399).
